name: Dizzy Defenses
description:
Dizzy Defenses is a puzzle arcade game in which you try to secure as many of your kingdom's keeps before the time runs out.

Click on a tower to rotate it, any attached wall will come along with it! To secure a keep, make sure to surround it with walls on all sides. Be mindful of the towers, blue towers rotate clockwise while red towers rotate counter clockwise.

This game was made in 48 hours for Kenney Jam 2021 to the theme of "Rotation".

Developed by Rubber Ducks:
Alain Sangalang
Daniel MacCormick

Additional Credits:

Assets: Kenney - www.kenney.nl
